byline.contributor: Tom Robbins contributed reporting, and Susan C. Beachy contributed research.
byline.original: By MICHAEL SCHWIRTZ and MICHAEL WINERIP

lead_paragraph: Michael Bukowski, an officer at the Ulster Correctional Facility, had been suspended after the July 2014 attack on Ramon Fabian, an inmate.

headline.main: Judge Acquits Guard in Assault That Maimed New York State Prisoner

snippet: Michael Bukowski, an officer at the Ulster Correctional Facility, had been suspended after the July 2014 attack on Ramon Fabian, an inmate.
